name: Meryem Lalouf
summary: Industrial Automation Engineer & Energy Efficiency Leader
description: Graduating in industrial automation and computer engineering, Meryem Lalouf has been a pioneer in promoting energy efficiency within Morocco's industrial sector. Starting her career at Vinaigrerie Moutarderie du Maroc (VMM) as a design office and methods technician, she quickly rose to the position of Industrial Performance Manager. In this role, Lalouf is instrumental in implementing strategies to maximize industrial energy efficiency, contributing to Morocco's climate goals under the Paris Agreement.
